Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 11th overall pick, by Boston in 2020...
Traded from Boston to St. Louis (B) on 3/2/2020 (Going to BOS: P John Kovach. Going to SLB: P Ryan Benjamin)...
Injured on 4/6/2021 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/5/2022...
Had first career hit (double) on 5/2/2022, off Wendell Cox (CHI)...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2022...
Won Rookie of the Year in 2022, going 17-7, 3.03 ERA...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Seattle on 8/6/2023, striking out 10...
Injured on 5/1/2024 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 5 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/12/2024, winning 2 games with a 0.57 ERA...
Injured on 7/11/2024 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 9/5/2024 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
1/31/2025: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,902,857 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 3/13/2025 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Was selected to the 2025 Allstar game...
